name: Almond Butter Cookies (Vegan)
description: Almond butter cookies! Yes, they are "almond butter" cookies with a hint of cardamom(elaichi). So delicious and crumbly these cookies are so easy to whip up. Vegan Recipe.
recipeIngredient: 1/2 teaspoon cardamom powder ((less if u don't like cardamom much :, more if u love it))
1 teaspoon oatmeal ((coarsely ground oats for a little crunch, optional))
2/3 cup self rising flour Or all purpose flour + 1/4 teaspoon baking powder

recipeInstructions.text: In a pan, mix the flax meal and hot water and let sit for a minute.
recipeInstructions.name: In a pan, mix the flax meal and hot water and let sit for a minute.

recipeInstructions.text: Add in the softened butters(kept out for half an hour), sugar and agave syrup and mix well by hand or by hand mixer until the mixture feels light.
recipeInstructions.name: Add in the softened butters(kept out for half an hour), sugar and agave syrup and mix well by hand or by hand mixer until the mixture feels light.

recipeInstructions.text: Add in the flours, salt, cardamom powder and lemon juice and mix till just about combined.
recipeInstructions.name: Add in the flours, salt, cardamom powder and lemon juice and mix till just about combined.

recipeInstructions.text: The mixture should be a sticky dough with no dry flour patches.
recipeInstructions.name: The mixture should be a sticky dough with no dry flour patches.

recipeInstructions.text: Oil hands and pick up tablespoon full dough, lightly roll into a ball and flatten on parchment paper using a fork. You can drop spoonfulls directly as well, to get random shaped cookies :), but dont let them get thicker than a 1/4 inch.
recipeInstructions.name: Oil hands and pick up tablespoon full dough, lightly roll into a ball and flatten on parchment paper using a fork. You can drop spoonfulls directly as well, to get random shaped cookies :), but dont let them get thicker than a 1/4 inch.

recipeInstructions.text: Bake in preheated oven at 350 degrees F for 9-10 minutes. the cookies should not be runny or liquidy. They might look wet, but check with toothpick to confirm they are not squishy.
recipeInstructions.name: Bake in preheated oven at 350 degrees F for 9-10 minutes. the cookies should not be runny or liquidy. They might look wet, but check with toothpick to confirm they are not squishy.

recipeInstructions.text: Take cookies off baking tray and cool on rack for a few minutes before burning your mouth!
recipeInstructions.name: Take cookies off baking tray and cool on rack for a few minutes before burning your mouth!

recipeInstructions.text: Store in airtight container for a week or so. Let me know how yours turn out!
